svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/26.1.1 Chrome/132.0.6834.210 Electron/34.3.3 Safari/537.36" scale="1" border="0" version="26.1.1"> <diagram id="bhOkQlZ77E434SmNz5FC" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="410" dy="1179" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-5" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="140" width="200" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-4" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="140" width="200" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-9" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillStyle=solid;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;opacity=30;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="270" width="530" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-8" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillStyle=solid;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;opacity=30;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="190" width="530" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-1" value="<div align="right"><b>Tx side</b></div>" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="200" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-3" value="<div><b>Rx side</b><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="280" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-4" value="send_bm" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="200" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-5" value="processed_bm" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="280" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-6" value="tx_allocated_bm" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="200" width="160" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-7" value="rx_hold_bm" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="280" width="160" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-6" target="MKLUq6TKUGJubY471e8F-6" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-2" value="<b>Shared buffer<br></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="150" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6KBD1OdElKorogy5ZVHJ-3" value="<b>Internal variables<br></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="150" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="rRb_Eaf5PNw3zUsDxqBI-1" value="tx_usage_bm" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="230" width="160" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
